website_summaries.verdict: The HydraTarp is a moderately priced model that features premium-strength grommets, double-stitched corners, and a design built to last.
pros: Available in a range of sizes
cons: Strangely, individual tarps may be a few inches longer or shorter than the listed size

customer_reviews.title: The thickness of the tarps is very nice and what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The thickness of the tarps is very nice and what I expected. The quality control on the product is not acceptable - the grommets are not stamped in all the way, the grommets are stamped in a varying places, some of the grommets fell apart as I opened the package, and the corners are not finished. I purchased two tarps so it was obviously not just one bad tarp that slipped through inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Lanini

customer_reviews.title: Product inspectors needed. Defective products shipped anyway?
customer_reviews.text: No quality control, obviously. No inspection for clearly defective grommet-hole misplacements and also missing grommets, rendering item worthless for attaching bungie cords or guidelines. Very disappointing, especially after the wait for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heavy Duty Tarp
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy duty tarp. I use it on a frame to cover my horses hay. After reading the reviews I was fully expecting to return this but mine arrived perfect. There are no grommet issues or otherwise I don't know if quality control has improved or if I just got lucky. If you are needing one of these I would say go for it, if it comes defective send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie C

customer_reviews.title: not like a puncture but a gap between material threads
customer_reviews.text: This tarp is advertised as waterproof. However, it leaked under a medium rain being completely straight and tied down. If you look at it against the sun one can see small holes, not like a puncture but a gap between material threads. And water gets through. Don't buy this tarp if you need protection from water
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: after 2 years still going strong
customer_reviews.text: when i was looking for a product of this quality i never thought it existed, boy was i wrong.in the extreme heat and windy monsoon most home supply stores dont carry any product that comes even close to this one that's why when today 4/5/18 i look back and remember that on july of 20016 i bought this product i had it for two years and looks like i can stand maybe a year or two more i don't regret buying it i give this product 1000% satisfaction i know its only 100% but that's how happy i am Awesome thick and hardy its better and cheaper the the ones they have at the building supply store.
customer_reviews.author: crazy chino

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality or Defective Product?
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a durable tarp to place over our pergola. We scoped several of them and opted for this one because of its description and promise of durability and superior quality - we were willing to pay top dollar for outstanding quality. Once it arrived at our home, we secured it over the pergola. It did not survive a passing shower that evening. It broke in one of the eyelets. I don't know if it was defective, I am requesting a replacement or a refund. I will post an update on how this gets resolved.
customer_reviews.author: TatianaU

customer_reviews.title: Last a year
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought this. My review is based on a full year of this item being used 24/7 outside in the elements. If you are going to get this to use occasionally then it would give it 5 stars, It's strong, heavy duty and waterproof. If you use it everyday it breaks down in the sun and the coating peels and leaks. This purchase is for my pergola until I get a my aluminum roofing attached.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: First impressions: grommets are high-quality - edge rope is ...
customer_reviews.text: First impressions: grommets are high-quality - edge rope is very thick- material is thick and heavy- white top reflects heat while the brown bottom stops light and heat transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Fram

customer_reviews.title: Defective Tarp
customer_reviews.text: It was defective. It had runs like an old pantyhose, and several rings were placed at the edge of the trap making it easy to tear. Asked for a replacement hopefully, I receive one that is free of defects.
customer_reviews.author: MAMA

customer_reviews.title: second one
customer_reviews.text: I use these tarps as a roof on my pergola. The first one lasted 4 years. This is out in the hot sun all day, no shade. It stays on through hurricanes, hail storms, snow and whatever. The one I took off would have been good for another year or so but I had already ordered a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pearce Data Inc

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This tarp is tough! Worth the extra money as you won't be replaci g this every 3 months like the blue, brown and green tarps you get in the big box stores. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: My fault for ordering the wrong size. Customer service was awesome. The quality of the tarp is great . It is alot thicker that the original cover. I used it to replace a cover for a 10x20 ft. Frame. I should have ordered a14x22ft tarp. Great quality and because it has a dark underside , it provides much more shade. Great quality tarp. Heavy duty for sure. Grommets are brass. I would buy again. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Corey mc

customer_reviews.title: Industrial Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have two seasons here in Texas... summer and not-summer. Not-summer usually runs from October thru March. The other six months of the year... hot Texas sun, UV and blasting sunlight and 100+ degree heat usually ends up destroying a heavy duty tarp in a year. This one's much heavier duty, albeit about $20 more than my usual one. It's worth the price. Nothing worse than realizing your tarp has failed in the middle of a 4" Texas thunderstorm.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeHavoc

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tarp, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tarp to cover my 12' trailer for trips to the dump. I have only used it once to travel the 15 miles to the dump location, but it performed flawlessly.... so no complaints The grommets every 18" is nice to attach the tarp to trailer. The white color is VERY white, so the brown side was used as the "up side." I would have preferred a 9' width, rather than 10, given the width of the trailer, but I use ropes over the top of the tarp to minimizing the billowing that occurs as I travel down the highway.
customer_reviews.author: tasmica in PNW

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tarp I've known in my entire 78 years. Three years of sun, rain, hail, snow and heavy winds are no match for this guy and he still looks new. He's now one of my best friends. And chatting with customer service is enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Durable Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have others of these and use them to shade and cover the runs for our chickens. The white color provides cooler temps. We have had one in use for a year now with no wear or issues in any form. Other tarps have to be replaced a couple of times - at least - per year. I am covering all of the chicken runs with these!
customer_reviews.author: Baracuda1956

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it !
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty tarp that I use as a shelter for my dogs so it is in the elements at all times , so far it is holding up as expected & based on the thick gage of this tarp I believe it will give me a lot of service. When I say a lot of service the lesser tarps I have used in the past have lasted around a year, I think this one should last a lot longer .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: much better than the cheaper blue tarps
customer_reviews.text: since hurricane Michael destroyed our roof over the deck in 2018, we have used at least eight of the cheaper blue tarps to cover the hot tub, chairs, etc. on the deck. they just don't hold up in the fl. sun for long. this tarp is much thicker than the blue ones, it is white on one side and dark on the other side. it reflects the heat better, has better grommlets and has sewn in rope along the sides. it's also water proof. better yet, it also had a 30 day money back guarantee. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lorraine Walker

customer_reviews.title: Used to put a cover on a pergola
customer_reviews.text: First time I have seen a two tone tarp. Brown on one side, white on the other. Worked perfectly to create shade on a pergola, put the white side up to reflect the sun and brown side down to complement the wood. Used bungy cords to attach to the frame of the pergola.
customer_reviews.author: SCS2

customer_reviews.title: Is it during? Workmanship is certainly in question
customer_reviews.text: I just received the tarp yesterday and was covering the item it was purchased to protect. I’m kinda skeptical about the workmanship because at least one of the grommets are very close to the boarder of the tarp. Time will tell on durability. Seems to 151be pretty heavy duty. It is advertised as UV resistant, that will definitely determine if it’s durable. I will follow up in about a year and let you all know. Update 5/17/2020 The tarp survived through the rest of the summer, fall and winter. The tarp is still in good condition. Quality product. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AstralBob

customer_reviews.title: 12" undersize & other issues
customer_reviews.text: Tarp is a full foot short! This would be fine if they advertised it as such, but the listing specifically says "within +/- a few inches". Appears a grommet hole was mis-placed leading to the rope on the edge being cut completely through. The fabric weave isn't uniform like most tarps. I don't expect it'll stand up to the elements for long.
customer_reviews.author: CrdStang

customer_reviews.title: One year later.
customer_reviews.text: I Put my tarp up April 2018. It is now April 2019. I have it connected with bungees for shade and bad weather. It has held up better than cheap blue tarp would of. It might, and I say might make it through the summer. Where it was folded out of the factory, is where it is showing the might not make it. Every seam line is starting to come undone, with small holes showing. So far it beats the blue.
customer_reviews.author: S Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Great Pergola Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I just attached this to the top of my pergola and it started raining. I can tell you it's definitely waterproof and my plants will not drown anymore and I can finally grill no matter what the weather. Also, with the top being white and the underside being brown, my porch and house are so much cooler and it looks good! I'll give an update later on the durability if I see any issues...no news is good news.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but not perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy tarp, and will surely protect our RV. Unfortunately, many of the grommets were not pressed into the hole properly. Many of the grommets had been struck in a way that caused a sharp edge to be stick out. This edge could possibly cut the rope used to tie it in place, and will surely cut your hand, as I found out. Had I had time, I would have sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Althea G. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I was very happily surprised when I unfolded this tarp. I was expecting a standard heavy duty tarp, but got something way better. This tarp is the heaviest duty tarp I have ever used. I'm using this tarp to make a 20x12 work area attached to my shed. Because it is so stiff and thick it took some work getting it set up but once secured it just laughed at the rain and wind. I will be buying more of this brand for camping tarps. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty tarp last long time, i have bought other tarps for my carport and they have hole and rip within 6 months, The one I bought about 16 months ago still looks new, so I purchased a second on for my boat. well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dounut55

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: We covered our boat with this tarp and then a snow came and then freezing rain. After the storms, in areas where the tarp sagged, there was about 8" of ice which had to be chipped away. No damage at all to the tarp. Very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Pogo

customer_reviews.title: Receiving quality product especially with that price!
customer_reviews.text: For $70.00 it should Have been made better. Looks like when they were making it they didn’t wait for it to cool down before folding it up. Write down the center of the tarp and in multiple spots the tarp looks like it’s going to ripe. Update Definitely not worth the money. Better off buying something that’s cheaper. I have not had this one for this long and it’s already starting to rip and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan bench

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tarp to put under my above ground pool. I wanted thick tarp that didn't cost too much since I'm not going to be using it really heavy duty. The quality of this tarp exceeded my expectations. It seems very sturdy and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tarp and used it to cover my trailer. I made 6 - 6 hour trips and 3 in the rain and it protected my things completely
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Scott Baird

customer_reviews.title: Fasteners are weak and have sharp edges.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the The fasteners are sharp, poorly manufactured and come loose with normal pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Susi

customer_reviews.title: Just rotted away
customer_reviews.text: It took almost exactly 1 year for this tarp to completely rot. True, up until that time, is was waterproof. Now the fibers are completely rotted through & it leaks like a sieve. No better than your commonplace cheap blue tarp. Definitely 'let the buy beware' on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tarp
customer_reviews.text: We are using this tarp on our back patio & park a truck under it. We haven't had it but a few days so cannot elaborate on how well it holds up in the TX heat & thunderstorms. That said, it's a great quality material..better than any other tarps we've used. From the looks of it I'm sure it will hold up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Nice tarp, heavy duty a bit short on the size though.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty, I'm hoping it will hold up. Plenty of grommets for tieing it down. My only complaint is that the size is 2-3" shy of the advertised size, really would have fit my use better if it had been fully 12x20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked good quality good
customer_reviews.text: Worked good quality is better than most of the other ones out there, wrapped up a open trailer and drove 850 miles in rain and snow worked great no leaks and held up good start to tear on the edges but it was pulled right with my straps and ropes
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Although we are not going to use the tarp right away, it looks well made and of quality material. Sorry I can't give a more definite answer. We are waiting for our old tarp to totally fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality tarp
customer_reviews.text: Used the tarp to cover the roof of my camper. Eyes on the corners of the tarp are not pressed in. 2 were in the bottom of the plastic bag. It is not a one piece tarp. It is seamed in the middle. That is where it rips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 ) 12'x16' tarps 3 of the 4 are OVER 12' ,not the 11'6" as they were supposed to be. One is actually 12'5".
customer_reviews.author: mike lux

customer_reviews.title: Provides cooling perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: We were not able to open this tarp and install it immediately but when we did there were little holes everywhere like some child got crazy with an ice pick. (we do not have children in our house). However it is perfect for shade over our back porch and cools our house amazingly. Don't imagine it will last as long as we hope but out of all the ones that we tried, in spite of the holes, this works the best
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Much more durable than the usual "heavy duty" tarps. ...
customer_reviews.text: Much more durable than the usual "heavy duty" tarps. Mine has survived several 50 mph gusty condition wind, where the lighter thickness tarps were ripping. I am impressed. Worth the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: Stev-o

customer_reviews.title: No ugly blue tint!
customer_reviews.text: Use this tarp when I am camping big, as my son calls it. DOesn't cast a blue pale on everyone standing under it! Heavy enough construction that is should last for many years, WIll definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: P. Prince

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a tarp to cover a leaking metal shed roof. It had to be 12 foot by 12 foot. Many tarps are not exact size. This one stated it was exactly the size listed, and it was indeed. It is thick enough to last and so far very waterproof. My wet, moldy shed issues are resolved thanks to this tarp. I look forward to putting a few garden tools and a mower back in the shed without fear of wet/mold.
customer_reviews.author: Flyfisher

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as they claim - very strong and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This tarp went beyond my expectations - it is super sturdy and very heavy. Made well and strong. I’m using it as a “roof” over my deck so I can enjoy my deck through all kinds of weather. I highly recommend this tarp and would purchase another myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: an excellent quality product, exceptionally tough, seems to be quite UV resistant after a year outdoors in CA. easily worth the extra money
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and unpacked it. Immediately obvious this is not that junk you're used to buying. For this type of home owners tarp, it's the top of the line. Cannot be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit and very well made
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit and very well made. our local stores never seem to want to carry the heavier covers. this looks like i can get more than one season out of it very good grommets as well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what i needed
customer_reviews.text: the tarp was exactly what I was needing, A replacement cover on my backyard gazebo,. the factory cover has been replaced 3 times now, it only lasts for about a year and a half, and wasn't very good quality. this tarp fit perfect and looks to be a lot better quality. also the price on this tarp was a lot less than the factory cover.
customer_reviews.author: camcon

customer_reviews.title: Really good value
customer_reviews.text: Got it to protect the RV roof without spending $800 in a RV custom cover almost impossible to install in less than 2 hours. It appears to be good quality, really thick and not so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Aimnkill

customer_reviews.title: Tough tarps
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tarp I bought 4 all together to cover large roof sections during construction, no leaks even though up for weeks at a time
customer_reviews.author: Al Arreguin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It's very thick and the grommets well made , stood up to recent 55 mph wind gusts
customer_reviews.author: robert harris

customer_reviews.title: Better tarp than what is available from big box stores.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this tarp now for approx. 6 months as a canopy cover over hay. So far no noticeable signs of wear from elements. Am pleased with quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: AM/FM

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty tarp
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty tarp. Like the fact the eyelets are so close, makes it much more secure when tied down.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: fell apart after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This tarp isn’t UV resistant after about 4 months it crumbled apart and the seams all split open. Extremely cheap quality the cheap tarps hold up much better don’t waste you money on this tarp as it will be garbage after a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Reichmuth

customer_reviews.title: See ya next year!
customer_reviews.text: One of my tarps had dirt and mold growing on a corner, and it was in a sealed bag, but all is good. And as far as rating this product a hit or a bust, well,,, I'll just keep reviews in good favor for now because time will tell about the durability and sturdiness. but good deal, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tarp
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, and Mother Nature has tried to give it beating. Stays outside in brutal Texas sun, covering old auto. Will buy again if it wears out.
customer_reviews.author: M's Brain

customer_reviews.title: An exceptional well made product!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike; It is an amazing tarp! I will never again shop the local box store for a tarp that is not waterproof and wares out within a year! Thank you for a awesome product from people who take pride in their work!
customer_reviews.author: Artzent

customer_reviews.title: A DONATION
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tarp as a donation for a dog rescuer. I didn't order for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie G. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality tarp, time will tell. Using it to cover a replacement she'd in a box. That lasted one winter
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product came with holes, waiting for resolve cualty issues, and some bronce rings was damage to.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Javier Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Thick tarps
customer_reviews.text: Used Tarps today...Nice thick material, just as we needed...hope they hold up well...Very pleased at this point...
customer_reviews.author: DollyGordon

customer_reviews.title: Not a true 16x20
customer_reviews.text: Just put it up so the question are to be determined. It is at least 4 inches shorter actual size not a true 16x20
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Pardun

customer_reviews.title: semms strong
customer_reviews.text: just put it on a pontoon on a lift in the lake seems very sturdy and flexable time will tell how it stands up to wind ... but I have high expectations that it will do well..
customer_reviews.author: Willie Quindt

customer_reviews.title: Great for a boat cover
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect size and weight for my boat cover. It completely covered the boat and the motors until I can get it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Karran L Bedwell

customer_reviews.title: The tarp looks great and is stronger than any I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have it open laying on my back porch and have not installed it as yet. The tarp looks great and is stronger than any I have purchased. I'm very happy with this product. Will install soon, as I am waiting for some new fencing to be installed before installing this tarp that will be near the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Schmaus

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Replace another so called farm duty tarp that lasted 6 months with this one. No comparison at all. This is one heavy duty tarp. Time will tell how it holds up but I like it so far
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Super Thick
customer_reviews.text: Great tarp! Super thick. UPS labeled it "HEAVY". We used it for covering an RV in the Pacific Northwest. It's more than twice as thick as the last one we got and it lasted 5 years in bad weather. Liked the grommet placement for tie downs and the integrated rope perimeter.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research to find the right tarp to use as a replacement cover for my canopy frame. It’s very heavy and has worked perfectly. It’s been through some pretty heavy windstorms without any trouble. It is considerably heavier than any others I have found for the same price or even more money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Living in Florida, the sun is very harsh on everything outside.
customer_reviews.text: With a 16 mil, white sided tarp, you can be assured that use of this tarp will be the best protection of whatever is covered. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Very Strong, Survived Tornado!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very strong and durable tarp. It survived a tornado without ripping or tearing apart. What more can you ask of a tarp?
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Tarp
customer_reviews.text: So far so good using it to cover my rv
customer_reviews.author: billr

customer_reviews.title: the best tarp I've ever used 💯 % waterproof
customer_reviews.text: this a very strong tarp my roof leaks all over this tarp keeps the water out very water proof I got one 2 years ago for a home made greenhouse and it's still in great shape best tarp I ever had well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Michael lee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It was missing the grommets on 1 side along the 40' side, didn't have time to send back or reorder so had to cut little slits down that side. Hope it doesn't tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m expecting a big storm tonight. Hope this holds up in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tarp
customer_reviews.text: I wish tarps are supplied with fasteners not just grommets. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: Hilde Wright

customer_reviews.title: This a poor  quality product and I won't purchase again !
customer_reviews.text: Likes , White outside brown inside looked very nice ,fit was perfect, dislikes ,became very brittle,ripping at seams, and is shreading apart ,only 15 months in Florida sun on carport and its shot ! Not uv protected or just crap materials !
customer_reviews.author: Johnny S.

customer_reviews.title: Hydra Tarp
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tarp on the market. Nothing else compares.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin Morris

customer_reviews.title: Look at it before you work your butt off putting it up
customer_reviews.text: One side of the tarp is missing a bungee hole. We didn’t realize this until after we had put it up and we’re tying all the sides down 😡
customer_reviews.author: heel lover

customer_reviews.title: 3 months in and its holding up great! Keeps the heat and rain away
customer_reviews.text: Ended up using this tarp as a cheap alternative for roofing on an addition i built for the back porch. 3 months in and its holding up great! Keeps the heat and rain away!
customer_reviews.author: Gerhardi A.J.

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty high end tarp!
customer_reviews.text: Very tough and high end tarp will last for many years of hard I would think. Will give update in the spring how it held up for my hard Colorado winter.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: TARP LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: Tarp leaked on my products during heavy rain damaged products received the replacement same problem
customer_reviews.author: charles wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great tarp !
customer_reviews.text: This tarp is great , my first one I bought, two years ago, is still waterproof !, and it's gets southern California sun every day. very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Q, duffduck

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Poor workmanship melted through the plastic drilled through the eye hook Made mistake so they re punched the tarp making 2 holes not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Heather Miller

customer_reviews.title: VERY Hardy quality
customer_reviews.text: VERY sturdy, thickest tarp I've ever found & well worth the price. Glad I found it. Going to be perfect for my project!
customer_reviews.author: R. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Delivered ahead of schedule and looks heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Using product as a weather cover for an outdoor bar. Tarp looks quite heavy and delivery was timely. Product is not installed yet but appears to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kinkaid

customer_reviews.title: Quality/Strength
customer_reviews.text: Best tarp quality we have found in last few years.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy, grommets well attached and accepted the cord that I was using to tie this around my woodpile. Has only been in use for 4 months but it is showing no wear at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's going to last long.
customer_reviews.text: Brown side is peeling off in alot of areas. This tarp has now been replaced!...that did not last long.....
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Super Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Tarp is heavy duty as promised. Used to wrap my 23 ft center console boat. She’s ready for the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality excellent package it was shipped in. Very happy with this tarp priced right!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The last one i bought is still in great shape with no issues. This one had a ripped eye right out of the box. You can see the creases in the photo where I just opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be good solid tarp
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be good solid tarp ,expect it to last much longer then others I have had and the fit was good on my travel trailer .
customer_reviews.author: WonOver

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to return
customer_reviews.text: Overall the tarp looked nice but it had a big thin spot down the middle and a slice in it. I don’t know much about tarps but i’m pretty sure they shouldn’t have holes in them right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Florida man

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tarp
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product...this is my 3rd year very strong... Stands up to all the elements
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tarp
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be more then respected, have purchased several before and paid tripe the price, use it to cover the hay storage for my horses. Well well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 3 months old and plastic is already coming off backing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for covering my shop after a tree fell on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Use for camper cover very poor built very thick good tarp but there is rope around whole tarp that is cut in several places by the grommets see pics would like to be contacted about issues
customer_reviews.author: floyd r morris jr

customer_reviews.title: sturdy covering for our roof
customer_reviews.text: A superb, sturdy covering for our roof, damaged by Hurricane Irma !!
customer_reviews.author: JOE THE HUN

customer_reviews.title: Cut to size and very good quality. I would recommend this and would buy another one.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it. I used it for a canopy but had to take it down because of hurricane threat. But it’s back up now works great.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L.

customer_reviews.title: Great tarp!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tarp, very heavy duty. Should get several years of use out of it. I used it to cover a storage shelter in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie W. Fox

product_meta.title: HydraTarp 12 Ft. X 20 Ft. Super Heavy Duty Waterproof Tarp - 16mil Thick - White/Brown Reversible Tarp
product_meta.description:
Size Name:12ft x 20ftThe HydraTarp family of Super Heavy Duty Tarps are designed for general purpose use and are manufactured with industrial grade materials and built to last. By using high grade material with 16mil thickness and a 14 x 14 weave, double re-enforcing all corners, heat sealing a thick rope along the hem of all outer edges, and using the highest quality brass grommets, Watershed Innovations delivers a high quality products at a fair price. 

Specifications : 

— Super Heavy Duty Tarp measuring 12ft wide x 20ft long 
— Material Specs : Weight - 8oz per Sq Yd | Thickness - 16 mil | Cross Weave 14 x 14 
— Double re-enforced corners with rope hem along all four edges 
— Reversible - White on one side, Brown on the other 
— Corrosive free high quality Brass Grommets spaced every 18 inches 
— UV Protection Layer for added protection of assets and longer tarp life 
— Waterproof and Rot-Proof construction 

Included in this Package : 

— 12ft wide x 20ft Long Super Heavy Duty 16mil HydraTarp - Reversible White / Brown 

About Watershed Innovations 

Watershed Innovations was founded in 2008 with the goal of creating user-friendly products that protect valuable property and land from water damage. Our customers include construction companies, agricultural entities, manufacturing facilities, premiere hotels, the military and other organizations that have large-scale water protection needs.
feature_bullets: Super Heavy Duty - 8 oz per square yard weight material with 16 mil thickness - Industrial Strength
Double re-enforced corners with rope hem along all four edges. Brass Grommets spaced every 18"
UV Protective coating protects your valuable assets and ensures longer life of the tarp.
These are full length tarps and measure within +/- a few inches of the full listed size.
HydraTarps come with a No questions asked 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
